welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mikolow, a charming and picturesque city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and discover our vibrant culture and stunning landscapes, and we hope you enjoy your stay with us."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielsko-Bialo Kaniow Airfield Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bielsko-Bialo Kaniow Airfield Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pyrzowice Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.
